amendment.description: Amendment amends the Sean Maloney (NY) amendment which appears on page H3234 of the Congressional Record by clarifying that as Federal funds are spent with regard to contracting, the Administration must not contravene the First Amendment, the Fourteenth Amendment, and Article I of the Constitution.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add the following language to the Sean Patrick Maloney amendment ",except as required by the First Amendment, the Fourteenth Amendment, and Article I of the Constitution".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pitts amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Pitts to the Maloney, Sean amendment (A047).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pitts amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Pitts to the Maloney, Sean amendment (A047).
